backend/main.mo: Defines the primary actor with all domain types for incidents, messages, evidence, police submissions, and summaries, integrating migration and external modules.
backend/migration.mo: Adds a new userSelectedDepartments map to the actor state and migrates old actor data to the new structure.
backend/police-department.mo: Defines the PoliceDepartment type with basic contact and address fields.
backend/stalker-profile.mo: Defines the StalkerProfile type containing identifying, location, and descriptive information about a suspect.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items connecting specific frontend files to requirements about persisting and loading the user’s selected police department.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries of various frontend files, describing their purpose and recent behavioral changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and applying base theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up PWA metadata, icons, SEO tags, and mounting the root application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, activation cleanup, offline fallback, and message handling for PWA updates.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile loading, and routing between login, profile setup, and main content with theming.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/CrimeHelp.tsx: Displays educational cards and links about legal rights, crime definitions, and safety resources.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header bar handling login/logout, theme toggling, and showing user profile info.
frontend/src/components/IncidentDetail.t: Shows detailed information for a selected incident, including messages, evidence, and police department handling logic.
frontend/src/components/IncidentForm.tsx: Form for creating or supplementing incident reports with validation and evidence file uploads.
Displays the user's list of incidents with loading/error states and supports selecting an incident to view details.
frontend/src/components/InstallationGuid: Provides share message templates and UI for recommending the app, including predefined message types, images, and copy/share actions.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveSumma: Fetches and displays an incident summary with formatting helpers, loading states, error handling, and intensity indicators.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Shows a branded login screen with feature highlights and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Hosts the main authenticated app tabs, routing between victim info, stalker info, incident forms, history, and other tools.
frontend/src/components/MaleUserWarningM: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/MessageGenerator: Renders UI to generate incident‑based messages with selectable tone and intensity, calling the backend to produce tailored text.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Renders a list of generated messages with actions like copy, share, and SMS sending, including formatting helpers for metadata.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalVide: Displays a motivational video in a dialog for authenticated users with loading, play/pause, and manual play controls.
frontend/src/components/PoliceReportDial: Dialog for submitting a police report with selected evidence, victim info, and narrative, including validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/PoliceSubmission: Fetches and displays a user's police submission logs with evidence details, statuses, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile creation form allowing users to submit their name and save it via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Shows a conditional PWA installation prompt with support for Android and iOS behaviors and dismiss persistence.
frontend/src/components/SavedStalkerProf: UI component for listing, viewing, editing, and deleting saved stalker profiles using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/StalkerRecord.ts: Main form for creating stalker records, managing police departments, and switching between current and saved profiles.
frontend/src/components/VictimProfile.ts: Form for viewing and editing the user's optional victim profile details stored via backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Computes actor readiness, initialization, and error state by inspecting React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for user profiles, stalker profiles, police departments, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme color variables for light/dark mode, custom gradients, and mobile utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/types.ts: Re-exports shared backend types and enums for consistent frontend typing.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitErrorMessage: Provides user-friendly actor initialization error messages and maps error patterns to readable text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/src/utils/waitForActorReady.ts: Waits for the React Query actor queries to finish initializing or erroring before proceeding.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, screens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking schema version, issues, and feature requests for police department persistence.
